__e: The bastard who shot Isabel is a free man... and my daughter is dead.
And if Isabel's murderer is like the rest of the world, he will have posted at least one photo that will lead us to him.
I called Jack to talk about it, and he told me what happened the night Isabel died.
The reason that Isabel did whatever it is that she did... It's not that she's low. She's just...
Isabel took something over weeks ago for Max, and I'd like it back.
I would like that, but Isabel has asked to talk with me.
This is what Isabel's mother and father witnessed.
Plus, me and Isabel, not that kind of relationship.
Actually Isabel and I thought that maybe we could start things off on the right foot by asking you if you'd consider being my best man.
